Trend Monitor Muscle Mass Analysis What is muscle mass? Analysis Muscle mass refers to the amount of soft muscle tissue in \nthe body. Other major components of the body include fat, \nbone, and water. Muscle mass refers to the amount of soft muscle tissue in \nthe body. Other major components of the body include fat, \nbone, and water. Muscles primarily help with movement, \nmaintaining posture, and supporting bodily functions. There \nare three main types of muscle: smooth muscle, which is in \nthe internal organs. Last Reading Average Trend

Connect to Google Fit Install Google Fit Disconnect Skip for Now Automatically sync readings with Google Fit Empower your condition management journey by monitoring improvement in vitals and daily activities on a single platform. Connect MyTatva with Google Fit to automatically sync readings like steps, heart rate, exercises etc. \u2022 Google Fit is an open platform that lets you control your fitness data from multiple apps and devices.\n\u2022 Connecting to Google Fit allows you to see more fitness and health data like steps, heart rate etc.\n\u2022 By connecting MyTatva and Google Fit, you can easily integrate your fitness activity from various sources to help you better understand your progress.\n\u2022 You can disconnect from Google Fit at any time by going to Account settings.

Notification Settings Exercise Reminder Set up a personalized reminder for your exercise Allow us to motivate you to exercise as per your schedule preferences Exercise Breathing Reminder Set up a personalized reminder for your breathing exercise Allow us to motivate you to exercise as per your schedule preferences Breathing Exercise Sleep Reminder Set up a personalized reminder for logging your sleep Get your Sleep Cycle back on track with us. Sleep Get reminded to track your breathing & physical exercises Breathing and exercise reminders motivate you to exercise. Once you\'re done, they enable you to track your exercises Steps Track Meal Reminder Set up a personalized reminder to track your meals Get into the habit of knowing your calorie consumption Drink Water Reminder Set up a personalized reminder to track your water intake These reminders will help you to meet your hydration goals for the day Save Vitals Reminder Set up a personalized reminder for logging your vitals Keep your Doctor/Health Coaches informed about your well-being.
